title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.4 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 256.4 - Records

State Regulations
A record or receipt of damaged merchandise, merchandise
found to be unfit and salvaged merchandise shall be kept by salvagers and shall
be kept open for inspection by the commissioner during business hours. These
records shall be kept on the premises of the salvager for a period of one year
following the completion of transactions involving a lot of
merchandise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
256.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
